// Glass on floor of Athena's Wrath with direct light

//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 CameraPositionVS;
//   float3 LightDirection;
//   float4 LightmapCoordinateScaleBias;
//   float4x4 LocalToWorld;
//   float LocalToWorldRotDeterminantFlip;
//   float3 TemporalAAParameters;
//   float4 VSRRealDCoefficients1;
//   float4x4 ViewProjectionMatrix;
//   float3x3 WorldToLocal;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                           Reg   Size
//   ------------------------------ ----- ----
//   ViewProjectionMatrix           c0       4
//   CameraPositionVS               c4       1
//   VSRRealDCoefficients1          c6       1
//   LocalToWorld                   c7       4
//   WorldToLocal                   c11      3
//   TemporalAAParameters           c14      1
//   LocalToWorldRotDeterminantFlip c15      1
//   LightmapCoordinateScaleBias    c16      1
//   LightDirection                 c17      1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c5, 0.00784313772, -1, 9.98999977, 0.693147182
    def c18, 2, 1, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_tangent v1
    dcl_normal v2
    dcl_texcoord v3
    dcl_color v4
    dcl_color o0.xyz
    dcl_color1 o1
    dcl_texcoord o2.xy
    dcl_texcoord1 o3
    dcl_texcoord4 o4.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 o5
    dcl_texcoord6 o6
    dcl_texcoord7 o7
    dcl_position o8

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mov r0.xyz, c17
    mul r1.xyz, r0.y, c12
    mad r0.xyw, c11.xyzz, r0.x, r1.xyzz
    mad r0.xyz, c13, r0.z, r0.xyww
    mad r1.xyz, v1.yzxw, c5.x, c5.y
    mad r2, v2, c5.x, c5.y
    mul r3.xyz, r1, r2.zxyw
    mad r1.xyz, r2.yzxw, r1.yzxw, -r3
    mul r1.xyz, r2.w, r1
    mul r3.xyz, r2.yzxw, r1.zxyw
    mad r3.xyz, r1.yzxw, r2.zxyw, -r3
    mul r3.xyz, r2.w, r3
    dp3 o4.x, r3, r0
    dp3 o4.y, r1, r0
    dp3 o4.z, r2, r0

// LocalToWorld
    mul r0, c8, v0.y
    mad r0, c7, v0.x, r0
    mad r0, c9, v0.z, r0
    mad r0, c10, v0.w, r0
    mul r4, r0.y, c1

// ViewProjectionMatrix
    mad r4, c0, r0.x, r4
    mad r4, c2, r0.z, r4
    mad r4, c3, r0.w, r4

// Move reflection to infinity:
texldl r31, c220.z, s3
mov r11, r4
mad r11.x, -r31.x, r31.y, r11.x

// Convert back to world coords for r0:
mul r0, r11.x, c180
mad r0, r11.y, c181, r0
mad r0, r11.z, c182, r0
mad r0, r11.w, c183, r0

    add r1.w, r4.z, c5.z
    add r3.w, r1.w, c6.x
    rcp r1.w, r1.w
    log r3.w, r3.w
    mul r3.w, r3.w, c6.y
    mad r5.x, r3.w, -c5_abs.w, c5_abs.y
    mov r5.w, c5.w
    mad r3.w, r3.w, r5.w, c6.z
    mul r3.w, r3.w, c6.x
    add r5.x, r5.x, -c6.z
    rcp r5.x, r5.x
    mul r3.w, r3.w, r5.x
    mul r1.w, r1.w, r3.w
    rcp r1.w, r1.w
    add r1.w, r1.w, c5.y
    mul r1.w, r1.w, c6.w
    mad r4.x, r1.w, c18.x, r4.x
    mul r1.w, r4.w, c14.z
    mov o8.zw, r4
    mad o8.xy, r1.w, c14, r4
    mad o2.xy, v4, c16, c16.wzzw
    mul o1.w, r2.w, c15.x
    mad r4.xyz, r0, -c4.w, c4
    mov o7, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r4.y, c12
    mad r0.xyz, c11, r4.x, r0
    mad r0.xyz, c13, r4.z, r0
    dp3 o6.x, r3, r0
    dp3 o6.y, r1, r0
    dp3 o6.z, r2, r0
    mul r0.xy, r2.y, c8.xzzw
    mad r0.xy, c7.xzzw, r2.x, r0
    mad r0.xw, c9.zyzx, r2.z, r0.yyzx
    mov o1.z, r0.x
    mul r1.yw, r1.y, c8.xxzz
    mad r1.xy, c7.xzzw, r1.x, r1.ywzw
    mad r0.xz, c9.zyxw, r1.z, r1.yyxw
    mov o1.y, r0.x
    mul r1.xy, r3.y, c8.xzzw
    mad r1.xy, c7.xzzw, r3.x, r1
    mad r0.xy, c9.xzzw, r3.z, r1
    mov o0.xyz, r0.xzww
    mov o1.x, r0.y
    mul o3, c18.yyzz, v3.xyxx
    mov o5, c18.z
    mov o6.w, -c5.y

// approximately 69 instruction slots used
